channel.title: Fused on Pozibl - the art of the possible
channel.description: Recent content in Fused on Pozibl - the art of the possible

item.title: Overture
item.description: Customize the public UDF to extract data from Overture Maps. Add the option to grab data from a polygon and convert polygons to points. Over the past year we have advised on the development of the Fused Platform. The Fused Platform is a data platform that allows users to access data from multiple sources and combine it into a single data set. All via using Python code that is already being used by data scientists and analysts.
